step1.title: Host: Create Invite Panel
step1.description: Type `/steam invite` to send an invite panel. You can send it privately via DM or recruit participants on a large scale through group DMs or server channels.

step2.title: Participants: Click Join Button
step2.description: Click the "Join Game Now!" button to automatically generate your personal invite link.

step3.title: Participants: Open Steam
step3.description: When the invite link is generated, click "Click to Join Game!" to open the Steam Remote Play Together page. Then just follow Steam's instructions and enjoy the game!

q1.question: Q. Is this tool free?
q1.answer: Yes, it's free. However, the host needs to purchase the game on Steam. Participants can play completely for free.

q2.question: Q. Which OS is supported?
q2.answer: The client supports Windows/Mac/Linux. However, only the host needs to download the client. Participants don't need the client and can join games just by receiving invite links.

q3.question: Q. How long is the invite panel valid?
q3.answer: It's valid until you close the client. When you restart the client, the invite panel becomes invalid, so please create a new invite panel.

q4.question: Q. Is this tool an official Steam feature?
q4.answer: No. "Steam Remote Play Together" is an official Steam feature, but this tool "Remote Play Inviter" is not official. This tool is an unofficial utility that automates the invite link generation for "Remote Play Together".

q5.question: Q. It says the invite link is invalid.
q5.answer: Invite links are single-use and become invalid once used. If disconnected, please click the "Generate Invite Link" button again to regenerate the link.

q6.question: Q. Which games can I use this with?
q6.answer: You can use it with any game that supports Steam Remote Play Together.

q7.question: Q. Can I use this on any Discord server?
q7.answer: Yes, it works on any server. However, it won't work on Discord servers where "Use External Apps" is not permitted.

q8.question: Q. Is the source code publicly available?
q8.answer: Yes, it's available on GitHub. You're free to modify and use it. Pull requests are welcome.

q9.question: Q. Can I play without a controller?
q9.answer: You can use software called x360ce to emulate a gamepad with your keyboard. Please see here for detailed instructions.
